thread.section_title: Vision Direct Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vision Direct Australia | www.visiondirect.com.au
thread.title: Greg
thread.title_full: Vision Direct Australia reviewed by Greg

author: Greg
title: Greg
text:
I have used Vision Direct for my last two pairs of glasses. They have always been very competitive with their pricing and the product has been first class.
The only issue I had was with the Transition tint I purchased. I asked the customer service agent directly how long it takes for the tint to return to clear after coming out of the sun. I was told 5 - 10 seconds. In reality, it is well over one minute. While the glasses and lenses are great, the tint was a bit of a letdown.
